scripts.prepare-website: bun run scripts/sync-website.ts && cd .build-cache/mirascope-website && bun i
scripts.dev: bun run prepare-website && cd .build-cache/mirascope-website && SKIP_DOCS_SYNC=1 bun run start
scripts.build: bun run prepare-website && (cd .build-cache/mirascope-website && SKIP_DOCS_SYNC=1 bun run build) && cp -r .build-cache/mirascope-website/dist dist
